description:
Cosy and charming apartment in trendy neighborhood, very close to the best of Brooklyn's new attractions (cafés, restaurants, bars, waterfront views)... You’ll love my place because of the coziness, the views, and ideal the location. Perfect for couples, families, adventurers, and business travelers.

The apartment has everything you need: updated kitchen appliances, all furnished, 2 bedrooms with queen beds, one facing south with a balcony, one facing north. One sectionnal sofa that can be used if more than 4 people, heat units in the rooms, TV and Wifi.

Greenpoint is one of my favourite areas in Brooklyn, definately my favourite to live in! It is quite, charming, lively at the same time, it is less than 20 minutes away from Grand Central, Manhattan, and yet so protected from the city crazyness. It is very close to the bustling nightlife of Greenpoint, Williamsburg and Manhattan.

The G train (Green line) is only a few blocks (3min walk). The 7 train (Purple) is a 10 minute walk across the Polaski bridge (very nice views of the city), 15 minutes to Grand Central.
name: Cozy and sunny 2 BR apartment in trendy Greenpoint
review: The apartment is located close to many great coffee shops and restaurants and just across the bridge to Manhattan. Suzzane left some good suggestions on things to do and places to visit which was very helpful. Although we didn't get to meet, she made sure that we had a good time and had everything we needed
